life_expectancy.name: Life expectancy
life_expectancy.method: Use World Bank annual series as provided; include only numeric values; round to 2 decimals.

co2_ppm.name: CO₂ (Global)
co2_ppm.method: Annual mean of monthly averages, exclude -99.99; round to 2 decimals.

u5_mortality.name: Under-5 mortality
u5_mortality.source_org: UN IGME via World Bank WDI
u5_mortality.method: Population-weighted global mean of national SH.DYN.MORT using SP.POP.TOTL; exclude aggregates; round to 2 decimals.

u5_mortality_coverage.name: U5MR coverage (per-year n_iso / n_pop)
u5_mortality_coverage.source_org: Derived from World Bank WDI coverage
u5_mortality_coverage.method: Per-year coverage: (#ISO with SH.DYN.MORT & SP.POP.TOTL) / (#ISO with SP.POP.TOTL).

ucdp_battle_deaths.name: Battle-related deaths (global)
ucdp_battle_deaths.method: Aggregate UCDP battle-related deaths by type_of_conflict using bd_best/best/best_estimate; join World Bank SP.POP.TOTL population; compute per 100k; enforce 1990-latest continuous coverage.
ucdp_battle_deaths.notes: Conflict-type mapping: 1→interstate, 2→intrastate, 3→internationalized_intrastate, 4→extrasystemic. Population denominator: World Bank WDI SP.POP.TOTL.

battle_deaths_total.name: Battle-related deaths (total)
battle_deaths_total.method: Sum all conflict types from UCDP battle-related deaths (bd_best/best/best_estimate) and divide by global population (World Bank WDI SP.POP.TOTL).
battle_deaths_total.notes: Per 100k rounding to 3 decimals; shared pipeline with battle_deaths_by_type. CSV v25.1 is consent-gated; local copy used.

battle_deaths_by_type.name: Battle-related deaths (by type)
battle_deaths_by_type.method: Per conflict type (1→interstate, 2→intrastate, 3→internationalized, 4→extrasystemic) deaths per 100k using World Bank SP.POP.TOTL; round to 3 decimals.
battle_deaths_by_type.notes: Types listed: interstate, intrastate, internationalized_intrastate, extrasystemic. CSV v25.1 is consent-gated; local copy used.

battle_deaths_interstate.name: Battle-related deaths (interstate)
battle_deaths_interstate.method: Filter by conflict type code 1 (interstate) from UCDP battle-related deaths, join World Bank SP.POP.TOTL, round to 3 decimals.
battle_deaths_interstate.notes: Tier-1 alignment metric; subset of battle_deaths_by_type output. CSV v25.1 is consent-gated; local copy used.

battle_deaths.name: Battle-related deaths (Tier-1 total)
battle_deaths.method: Sum all UCDP battle-related deaths (codes 1-4) and divide by global population (World Bank SP.POP.TOTL); round to 3 decimals.
battle_deaths.notes: Tier-1 alignment metric; uses battle_deaths_total.json (global total). CSV v25.1 is consent-gated; local copy used.

homicide_rate.name: Intentional homicide rate (global)
homicide_rate.source_org: UNODC & WHO via World Bank WDI
homicide_rate.method: Hybrid: population-weighted mean of national rates when coverage ≥95%; otherwise use UNODC/WHO global estimate via WDI (WLD). Single frozen WDI snapshot; region aggregates excluded; values rounded to 3 decimals. (WDI indicator VC.IHR.PSRC.P5; population SP.POP.TOTL; WLD fallback when coverage <95%).
homicide_rate.notes: Coverage <95% in early years due to missing national submissions; see console WARNs from scripts/fetch_homicide_rate.ts.

military_expenditure_per_capita.name: Military expenditure per capita (global)
military_expenditure_per_capita.method: Population-weighted mean of SIPRI military expenditure (current USD, MS.MIL.XPND.CD) divided by World Bank SP.POP.TOTL population; excludes aggregate ISO regions; values rounded to 1 decimal.
military_expenditure_per_capita.notes: Source snapshot stored in data/raw/sipri_milex.csv; see scripts/fetch_military_expenditure_per_capita.ts.

military_expenditure_per_capita_constant.name: Military expenditure per capita (constant 2020 USD)
military_expenditure_per_capita_constant.method: Apply WLD GDP deflator rebased to 2020 (NY.GDP.MKTP.CD / NY.GDP.MKTP.KD) to SIPRI MS.MIL.XPND.CD before dividing by SP.POP.TOTL; round to 1 decimal.
military_expenditure_per_capita_constant.notes: Global Tier-1 constant-price series emitted from scripts/fetch_military_expenditure_per_capita.ts using data/raw/wld_gdp_deflator.csv.

military_expenditure_per_capita.by_count.name: Military expenditure per capita (by country)
military_expenditure_per_capita.by_count.method: Country-level SIPRI military expenditure (current USD) divided by national population; ISO3-normalized; values rounded to 1 decimal.
military_expenditure_per_capita.by_count.notes: Companion dataset to the Tier-1 global mean; rows emitted only when both expenditure and population are present.

military_expenditure_per_capita_constant.name: Military expenditure per capita (constant 2020 USD, by country)
military_expenditure_per_capita_constant.method: Country SIPRI MS.MIL.XPND.CD deflated with rebased WLD GDP deflator prior to dividing by SP.POP.TOTL; ISO3-normalized; round to 1 decimal.
military_expenditure_per_capita_constant.notes: Optional companion for future toggle; uses data/raw/wld_gdp_deflator.csv with frozen SIPRI inputs.

military_expenditure_percent_gdp.name: Military expenditure (% of GDP) (global)
military_expenditure_percent_gdp.method: GDP-weighted mean of SIPRI military expenditure share (MS.MIL.XPND.GD.ZS) using current GDP (NY.GDP.MKTP.CD); excludes aggregate ISO3 codes; rounded to 2 decimals.
military_expenditure_percent_gdp.notes: Global Tier-1 companion to per-capita spending; relies on frozen data/raw/sipri_milex_percent_gdp.csv.

military_expenditure_percent_gdp.by_coun.name: Military expenditure (% of GDP) (by country)
military_expenditure_percent_gdp.by_coun.method: National SIPRI military expenditure share of GDP; ISO3-normalized; rows require both percent and GDP; rounded to 2 decimals.
military_expenditure_percent_gdp.by_coun.notes: Companion dataset for future country toggle; sourced from data/raw/sipri_milex_percent_gdp.csv.

sipri_milex.name: SIPRI Military Expenditure Database
sipri_milex.notes: Frozen SIPRI via World Bank WDI indicators MS.MIL.XPND.CD (current USD) and MS.MIL.XPND.GD.ZS (% of GDP) with matching GDP denominators (NY.GDP.MKTP.CD).

wb_gdp_deflator_wld.name: World Bank GDP deflator (World, NY.GDP.MKTP.CD / NY.GDP.MKTP.KD)
